quote: When someone tells you something big, it's like you're taking money from them, and there's no way it will ever go back to being the way it was. You have to take responsibility for listening.
quote_letters: WHEN SOMEONE TELLS YOU SOMETHING BIG ITS LIKE YOURE TAKING MONEY FROM THEM AND THERES NO WAY IT WILL EVER GO BACK TO BEING THE WAY IT WAS YOU HAVE TO TAKE RESPONSIBILITY FOR LISTENING
